review_data.title: best pho in town!
review_data.content: if you are looking for high quality and authentic vietnamese cuisine, you are dead right here! Really love all dishes and use to go there for dinner. Everything is prepared with high quality ingredients (yes, we talk about sliced entrecôte in the soup!) turning the...More

review_data.title: Lovely place
review_data.content: Fresh food, friendly, very quiet and personal place. Equipped with a piano and a karaoke system. Spring rolls, Beef, Salads were delicious. Should try beef soups (pho) and pancakes (banh xeo) the next time.

review_data.title: Worth the (minor) extra trip

review_data.title: Nice and quiet vietnamese

review_data.title: Very friendly and personal
review_data.content: The food we had was really great, the vietnamese kitchen is light and tasty here. We had a longer talk with the owner, a very friendly and open minded person! Absolutely recommended.
